class_notes: This section is for traditional BSN semester 4 students only.
course_description: This course prepares the student for transition to independent practice as a professional nurse. Course objectives will assist the student in understanding requirements for licensure, scope of practice, leadership/management roles, information technology, professional organizations, and advocacy.
sections: Class Nbr: 2452, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 3-4:50p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
